ai.summary: A short, easy 3 km stroll through the Capability Brown-designed grounds of Dinefwr, offering gentle paths, open vistas, and a touch of historic landscaping. Suitable for families and casual walkers, with flat to gently undulating terrain and scenic river views.
ai.terrain_summary: Gravel and compacted paths with some grassy sections. Mostly flat with gentle slopes on short sections. Occasional steps or boardwalks near garden features.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight before you go. Stay on marked paths and follow any site guidelines. Be mindful of livestock or cyclists on shared routes. Carry a map or fully charged phone, and bring water and appropriate clothing for rain or wind.
recommended_gear: Map or phone with offline access
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October); can be walked year-round with appropriate weather gear.

seo.title: Capability Brown Walk at Dinefwr – Easy 3 km stroll in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the Capability Brown-designed grounds at Dinefwr with an easy 3 km walk. A family-friendly route on flat paths with scenic views and historic landscaping in the UK.
